About This Calculator

How It Works

This calculator determines paint requirements by calculating net surface area (total minus openings), multiplying by number of coats, and dividing by coverage rate. Results are rounded to practical gallon quantities.

Assumptions

  • Standard paint application methods
  • Coverage rates for quality interior/exterior paint
  • Does not include primer (calculate separately)
  • Rounds up to nearest quart for purchase
  • Does not account for paint losses or equipment cleaning

Professional Use

This calculator provides ROM estimates for paint quantity planning. Actual coverage may vary based on surface porosity, application method, and paint quality. Always purchase 10-15% extra for touch-ups.
